00010 #include "OgrePagingLandScapePrecompiledHeaders.h"

00012 #include "OgreNoMemoryMacros.h"

00015 #include <sys/types.h>
00016 #include <sys/stat.h>
00017 
00018 #ifdef _WIN32
00019 #   include <windows.h>
00020 #   include <direct.h>
00021 #   include <io.h>
00022 
00023 #   define S_ISDIR(mode) (mode&S_IFDIR)
00024 #   define STRUCT_STAT  struct _stat
00025 #   define CHDIR        _chdir
00026 #   define GETCWD       _getcwd
00027 #   define MKDIR(A)     _mkdir(A)
00028 #   define STAT(A,S)    _stat(A,S)
00029 #else //_LINUX _APPLE
00030 
00031 #ifdef _APPLE
00032 #   include <malloc/malloc.h>
00033 #else 
00034 #   include <malloc.h>  
00035 #endif
00036 #   include <unistd.h>
00037 #   include <sys/param.h>
00038 
00039 #   define MAX_PATH MAXPATHLEN
00040 #   define STRUCT_STAT  struct stat
00041 #   define CHDIR        chdir
00042 #   define GETCWD       getcwd
00043 #   define MKDIR(A)     mkdir(A, S_IRWXU | S_IRGRP | S_IXGRP | S_IROTH | S_IXOTH)// set mode of directory to drwxr-xr-x.
00044 #   define STAT(A,S)    stat(A,S)
00045 #endif  //_LINUX _APPLE
00046 
00047 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 static char* GetCurrDir()
00049 {
00050     // GETCWD MALLOCS A BUFFER. REMEMBER TO FREE IT.
00051     return GETCWD(0,0);;
00052 }
00053 
00054 #ifdef __cplusplus
00055 extern "C" { 
00056 #endif
00057 
00058 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 bool DirExists(const char *Dirname)
00060 {
00061     STRUCT_STAT st; 
00062 
00063     if (STAT(Dirname, &st)) 
00064     {
00065         // doesn't exist; must create it
00066         return false;
00067     }
00068     if (S_ISDIR(st.st_mode) == 0) 
00069     {
00070         // it's not a dir, must create a dir        
00071         return false;
00072     }
00073     return true;
00074 }
00075 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00076 char * ChangeToDir (const char *Dirname)
00077 {
00078     STRUCT_STAT st;
00079 
00080     if (STAT(Dirname, &st))
00081         {
00082         // doen't exist; must create it
00083         MKDIR (Dirname);
00084         }
00085     if (S_ISDIR(st.st_mode) == 0) 
00086         {
00087         // it's not a dir, must create a dir
00088         MKDIR (Dirname);
00089         }
00090     char *oldDirname = GetCurrDir ();
00091     CHDIR(Dirname);
00092     return oldDirname;
00093 }
00094 
00095 
00096 void RetablishDir(char *oldDirname)
00097 {
00098     if (oldDirname != NULL) 
00099      {
00100         ChangeToDir (oldDirname);
00101         // FREE MALLOC'ED GETCWD BUFFER.
00102         free (oldDirname);
00103     }
00104 }
00105 
00106 #ifdef __cplusplus
00107 }/* end extern C definitions */ 
00108 #endif
